item.title: Very cool CSS map
item.dc:creator: calhoun_freeman
item.description:
Vincent Vega:

Video editing takes time, I wanna go somewhere this evening bro, in fact in 10 minutes, it is getting late here. So yea

Then take time. Showcasing a map SHOWCASES how good your map looks. The video was sloppy, and gave the impression that the map was sloppy too. Why the rush? Take your time. Do your editing tomorrow if you can’t do it today.

Read full topic

item.title: Very cool CSS map
item.dc:creator: Vincent_Vega
item.description:
calhoun freeman:

  1. When showcasing a map, do it with cl_drawhud 0 and START IN GAME.

  2. Match the song with the map. Sunset ridge should not have master of puppets (although one of my favorites).

  3. Did you even playtest it? It doesn’t even look balanced.

  4. Did not show T spawn

  5. Lighting. Nobody wants to play in complete darkness. Remember, lights bounce around, making the room not completely dark, but dark enough.

I stated in the video that for some reason fraps Massively increases the Contrast in my videos (the actual map is brighter)

The map is maybe slightly T sided Not really tho, only one path is favorable to the Terrorists really (the garage entrance into the red carpeted room)

T spawn in by the hosties

Video editing takes time, I wanna go somewhere this evening bro, in fact in 10 minutes, it is getting late here. So yea

I think that sums up what you wanted to know

Read full topic

  2. Match the song with the map. Sunset ridge should not have master of puppets (although one of my favorites).

  5. Lighting. Nobody wants to play in complete darkness. Remember, lights bounce around, making the room not completely dark, but dark enough.

item.title: Very cool CSS map
item.dc:creator: Vincent_Vega
item.description:
Ok I did listen to your feedback, but I didn’t want my map to get to many bad reviews
So here is the updated version
I updated the bump maps to look better, switched a couple of textures up (This is only my second map ever, I am not very experienced)
Added some more detail, Specifically DECALS
Got rid of some of my weird architecture, I don’t even know why I added some of it
I changed the name of the map

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SrQEvhMWm08
(Possibly the most errors ever to occur at once)

Actual video
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_Ths_P2flfI
Note that For some damn reason fraps increases the contrast in my videos

Here is where the map actually is
https://www.gamebanana.com/maps/158414

Read full topic
